nodes.text: The Murdered Mandalore was the leader of the Mandalorians around 132 BBY.

That year, he was assassinated by the bounty hunter Durge and a group of rogue Jedi Knights in an act of vengeance for the Mandalorians' genocide of the Ithullans a century earlier. In return, the Mandalorians captured and tortured Durge, sending him into a decades-long hibernation.
